title: pd-status — Pipe Dream process overview utility

comment: QA Pre-Review: COMPLIANT. All criteria verified with evidence. FRONTMATTER: title = pd-status - Pipe Dream process overview utility (present, non-empty). revision_summary = Initial draft (acceptable for v0.1 per SOP-001 Section 5.1). STRUCTURE: All 12 required sections per SOP-002 Section 6 are present and substantive. PLACEHOLDERS: No TBD/TODO/FIXME/XXX found in pre-approved Sections 1-9. Execution placeholders in Sections 10-12 are expected at pre-review stage. TRACEABILITY: Parent Document stated as None (independent improvement). References cite SOP-001 and SOP-002. FORMATTING: Consistent section numbering, markdown nesting, table formatting, and styling throughout. TYPOS/ERRORS: None found. REVIEWER ASSIGNMENT: No TU assignment required. This CR creates a standalone bash utility script with zero impact on existing code, architecture, or controlled documents. No domain-specific technical review is warranted. Recommend proceeding to pre-approval.

QA Post-Review: NON-COMPLIANT. One deficiency found.

DEFICIENCY: Frontmatter revision_summary is still set to 'Initial draft' at v1.1. Per SOP-001 Section 5.1, revision_summary must be 'Updated each revision cycle to describe changes.' The value must describe what changed in this revision — the execution evidence added to Sections 10-12. Example: 'Post-execution: all EIs passed, pd-status script created and verified.'

All other post-review criteria are satisfactory:
- EI-1: Pass. Script created (249 lines), implementation details documented.
- EI-2: Pass. Verified with running services, stale PID warnings and container display confirmed.
- EI-3: Pass. Stale PID scenarios verified, help flag verified.
- Execution Comments: Two platform discoveries documented (Git Bash PID visibility, pipefail interactions).
- Execution Summary: Present and substantive, accurately summarizes outcome.
- No VARs required (no deviations from plan).
- pd-status file confirmed to exist in project root.

ACTION REQUIRED: Update revision_summary in frontmatter to describe the v1.1 changes, then re-route for post-review.

QA Post-Review (Round 2): COMPLIANT. Prior deficiency resolved.

DEFICIENCY RESOLUTION: revision_summary updated from 'Initial draft' to 'CR-062: Added execution evidence — all 3 EIs passed, execution comments documenting platform discoveries, execution summary'. Field now accurately describes v1.2 changes and references the authorizing CR ID. Confirmed compliant with SOP-001 Section 5.1.

EXECUTION EVIDENCE (confirmed unchanged from Round 1 review):
- EI-1: Pass. Script created (249 lines), all specified features implemented.
- EI-2: Pass. Verified with running services, stale PID warnings, container display.
- EI-3: Pass. Stale PID detection verified, help and error handling confirmed.
- Execution Comments: Two platform discoveries documented.
- Execution Summary: Present, substantive, accurately summarizes outcome.
- No VARs. No deviations from plan.
- Deliverable (pd-status) confirmed present in project root.

NO REGRESSIONS: All sections unchanged from prior round except corrected frontmatter. No new placeholder content, no formatting issues, no typos.

Recommend proceeding to post-approval.
